channel.title: My account was deleted?
channel.description: I tried logging in today only to find that it said my username didn't exist on the website. I had to completely re-register my account. I wasn't notified that I'd broken any forum rules, and I was able to re-register with the same e-mail, so what gives? Did the website delete me automatically for some reason?

item.title: My account was deleted?
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
Ah, I see. Thank you for the explanation!
I’m not too upset by it, I’m just glad to know what happened.

Read full topic

item.title: My account was deleted?
item.dc:creator: your-name-here
item.description:
What Joe said. I’m really sorry for that. There were literally 400+ spam bots that registered out of nowhere completely destroying the forums. I tried to delete as many as I could. Sorry about that. I will triple check the list next time.

Read full topic

item.title: My account was deleted?
item.dc:creator: Fr0z3n
item.description:
We were hit with a large wave of spam bots, so it’s possible your account accidentally got caught in the nuke when they were removed. I can talk with someone and see if we can figure out what happened.

Read full topic

item.title: My account was deleted?
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
I tried logging in today only to find that it said my username didn’t exist on the website. I had to completely re-register my account.
I wasn’t notified that I’d broken any forum rules, and I was able to re-register with the same e-mail, so what gives? Did the website delete me automatically for some reason?
